entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Musgrave Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to freezing drizzle or flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
